title: For all Kha'Zix players
body:
Don't you just love how you can Q mid flight on your W, especially when it's evolved?

{{champion:121}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:121}}

replies.body: Fairly annoying, no logic involved in it but y'know. No one plays Kha anymore so
